overview_of_class: The purposes of the seminar include coordination of activities relating to student teaching/internship, answers to questions, possible solutions to dilemmas, and support to students throughout the quarter. Additionally, the seminar will strive to enrich the experience of students as much as possible, to introduce or emphasize topics pertinent to successful teaching, and most importantly, facilitate development of professional teachers.
name: Student Teaching: Humanities
title: SESP TEACH_ED 388-0-20 Student Teaching: Humanities

descriptions.name: Overview of class
